title: How to Get the U.S Marshal Uniform in Red Dead Redemption

steps.headline: Go to Pike's Basin.
steps.description: To get to Pike's Basin, go east of the town Armadillo until the name Pike's Basin appears on the top of the screen. This is one of the gang hideouts.

steps.headline: Go to Twin Rocks.
steps.description: Go northwest of Armadillo to get to Twin Rocks. This is another one of the gang hideouts.

steps.headline: Go to Gaptooth Breach.
steps.description: To get to Gaptooth Breach go west from Ridewood Farm. This is another one of the gang hideouts.

steps.headline: Go to Tumbleweed.
steps.description: To get to Tumbleweed, go southwest of Benedict Point. This is another one of the gang hideouts.

steps.headline: Go to Fort Mercer.
steps.description: Go east of Benedict Point to get to Fort Mercury. This is another one of the gang hideouts. It is also one of the most fun gang hideouts to go to.

steps.headline: Go to Soloman's Folly.
steps.description: To get to Soloman's Folly, go west of Plainview and south of Benedict Point. This is the last gang hideout listed here.

tyn: Red Dead Redemption Map (comes with the video game) (optional)
text: Go to Pike's Basin. To get to Pike's Basin, go east of the town Armadillo until the name Pike's Basin appears on the top of the screen. This is one of the gang hideouts. Go to Twin Rocks. Go northwest of Armadillo to get to Twin Rocks. This is another one of the gang hideouts. Go to Gaptooth Breach. To get to Gaptooth Breach go west from Ridewood Farm. This is another one of the gang hideouts. Go to Tumbleweed. To get to Tumbleweed, go southwest of Benedict Point. This is another one of the gang hideouts. Go to Fort Mercer. Go east of Benedict Point to get to Fort Mercury. This is another one of the gang hideouts. It is also one of the most fun gang hideouts to go to. Go to Soloman's Folly. To get to Soloman's Folly, go west of Plainview and south of Benedict Point. This is the last gang hideout listed here.
